TopicTitle: Not sure where to go from here

Articles.Content:
(Sorry if my English is bad) I'm fairly new to KSP 2 and I was just wondering where I should go or what I should do at my skill level.

I've been to both the Mun and Minmus before and have even been to both in 1 mission, I have a couple of satellites orbiting Kerbin, The Mun, Minmus and Duna but now I'm not sure what to do next. I've tried a couple of times at making a space station but I'm quite bad at rendezvous and docking, I could maybe just keep on trying to improve my docking skills or go to another planet but I'm not interested in the latter at the moment. I'd appreciate some cool ideas or tips on what to do and where to go from this point.

You could orbit the sun and get some science. If you do want to go to other planets, all you need to land on Eve is a heat shield and a parachute. (Getting back is a whole other story.) If you can land on and return from Mun, Duna isn't much harder. Or, you could visit their moons, Gilly and Ike, respectively. 

Also, welcome to the forum.

Ike and Gilly are both pretty cool. Ike because it's familiar, yet different than Mun or Minmus, and not too far away. Gilly for something new- it's like everything is in slow motion there. Also, jumping is a viable way to launch for orbit on Gilly, lol.
And Ike has nice views of Duna.
Asteroid base building is a challenge and is what I am doing now in a stock game.
you could try an ssto if you have the tech.
